member.name: IVideoFrameNative.GetData
member.summary: This method returns an interface that provides access to the video data.
member.param: The IID of the interface to retrieve.
When this method returns successfully, contains the interface pointer requested in riid parameter.
member.returns: Returns S_OK on successful completion. Returns E_NOINTERFACE if the requested interface can't be found.

member.name: IVideoFrameNative.GetDevice
member.summary: This method returns a device associated with the video data.
member.param: The IID of the device to retrieve.
When this method returns successfully, contains the device pointer requested in riid parameter.

member.name: IVideoFrameNative
member.summary: Represents a frame of video data.
